greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Alternating row sums of Sheffer triangle S2[4,1] = A285061.
comment: See A285061 for details. This is a generalization of A000587.
formula: a(n) = e*Sum_{m>=0} ((-1)^m / m!)*(1 + 4*m)^n, n >= 0, (Dobiński type formula).
a(n) = Sum_{k=0..n} binomial(n, k) * 4^k * A000587(k), n >= 0. - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Apr 23 2017
program: def a(n): return sum([binomial(n, k)*bell(k, -1)*4**k for k in range(n + 1)]) # _Indranil Ghosh_, May 06 2017
results.author: _Wolfdieter Lang_, Apr 13 2017
